header.title: Izixhobo ze-Salatiso OHS
intro.title: Ukukhuseleka koKwakha
intro.description: Qinisekisa ukuthobela imithetho yokhuseleko lokwakha ngezixhobo ze-Salatiso OHS. Izixhobo zethu zinceda ukulawula imingcipheko, ukuthobela imithetho, nokukhusela abasebenzi emsebenzini, zisebenzisa iindlela ezilungileyo ezichazwe kwi-"Safety First: The Essentials of OHS Plans."
legal_obligations.client.title: Iimbopheleleko zoMthengi
legal_obligations.client.reg_5_1_a: UMmiselo woKwakha 5(1)(a): Lungiselela uVavanyo loMngcipheko oSisiseko (BRA) ochaza iingozi zeprojekthi.
legal_obligations.client.reg_5_1_b: UMmiselo woKwakha 5(1)(b): Nikezela ngeNkcazo yeMpilo noKhuseleko echaza iimfuno ezikhethekileyo zeprojekthi.
legal_obligations.client.reg_5_1_l: UMmiselo woKwakha 5(1)(l): Vuma iSicwangciso seMpilo noKhuseleko soMkhontrakthi ngaphambi kokuba umsebenzi uqale.
legal_obligations.contractor.title: Iimbopheleleko zoMkhontrakthi
legal_obligations.contractor.reg_7_1_a: UMmiselo woKwakha 7(1)(a): Phuhlisa iSicwangciso seMpilo noKhuseleko esisekelwe kwinkcazo yoMthengi.
legal_obligations.contractor.reg_7_1_b: UMmiselo woKwakha 7(1)(b): Gcina iFayile yeMpilo noKhuseleko emsebenzini enazo zonke iingxelo ezifunekayo.
legal_obligations.contractor.reg_9: UMmiselo woKwakha 9: Qhuba uVavanyo lwe-Hazard Identification kunye noMngcipheko (HIRAs) ngokukhethekileyo.
legal_obligations.professional.title: Iimbopheleleko zoMsebenzi we-H&S
legal_obligations.professional.reg_5_5: UMmiselo woKwakha 5(5): Ii-Arhente (PrCHSA) zilawula i-H&S egameni loMthengi, ziqinisekisa ukuthobela.
legal_obligations.professional.reg_8_5: UMmiselo woKwakha 8(5): Amagosa (CHSO) ancedisa abakhontrakthi ekuphumezeni nasekubekeni iliso kwiinkqubo ze-H&S.
legal_obligations.professional.sacpcmp: Izikhokelo ze-SACPCMP: Kufuneka ugcine ubhaliso kunye neemfuno ze-CPD kwindima yobungcali.
wizard.step_0: Nceda ukhethe isenzo ukuze uqale inkqubo.
wizard.step_1.title: Inyathelo 1 kwezi-9: Ufuna Ukwenza Ntoni?
wizard.step_1.label: Khetha amaXwebhu oza kuwaQulunqa (Khetha zonke ezisebenzayo):
wizard.step_1.error: Nceda ukhethe ubuncinane ixwebhu elinye oza kuliququnqa.
wizard.step_2.title: Inyathelo 2 kwezi-9: Iinkcukacha zoMthengi
wizard.step_3.title: Inyathelo 3 kwezi-9: Ngaba uMkhontrakthi uQeshiwe?
wizard.step_4.title: Inyathelo 4 kwezi-9: Iinkcukacha zoMkhontrakthi
wizard.step_5.title: Inyathelo 5 kwezi-9: Iinkcukacha zeProjekthi
wizard.step_6.title: Inyathelo 6 kwezi-9: Umda weProjekthi
wizard.step_7.title: Inyathelo 7 kwezi-9: Iququnqwe Ngu
wizard.step_8.title: Inyathelo 8 kwezi-9: Iququnqelwe
wizard.step_8.specify_error: Nceda uchaze ukuba ixwebhu liququnqelwe bani.
wizard.step_9.title: Inyathelo 9 kwezi-9: Phonononga kwaye Yongeza kwiNgobozi
wizard.step_9.description: Phonononga izinto ozikhethileyo kwaye yongeza amaxwebhu kwingobozi yakho ukuze uhlawule.
cart.title: Ingobozi Yakho
cart.invoice_reference: Inombolo yeReferensi ye-Invoyisi: (Isebenza iintsuku ezisi-7. Bhalisa ukuze ugcine ixesha elide!)
resources.title: Qhagamshelana nabantu abavunyiweyo be-H&S
resources.description: Ufuna uncedo lobuchule? Nxibelelana nabantu abavunyiweyo ngeemfuno zeprojekthi yakho.
resources.jane_doe: Jane Doe, i-Arhente ye-SACPCMP (PrCHSA) - Inombolo yoBhaliso: PR12345 - uQhagamshelwano: jane.doe@example.com
resources.john_smith: John Smith, iGosa le-SACPCMP (CHSO) - Inombolo yoBhaliso: CHSO67890 - uQhagamshelwano: john.smith@example.com
footer.copyright: © 2025 Izixhobo ze-Salatiso OHS. Onke amalungelo agciniwe.
footer.newsletter.title: Hlala uHlaziyiwe
sidebar.step_0.title: 📜 Ukuthobela kwe-OHS
sidebar.step_0.description: Qala ngokukhetha inkonzo ukuqinisekisa ukuthobela uMthetho weMpilo noKhuseleko eMsebenzini.
sidebar.step_0.fun_fact: ⚡ Inyaniso eMnandi: Ngaba uyazi ukuba amaxwebhu e-OHS afanelekileyo anganciphisa izehlo emsebenzini nge-30%? Masifikeleleke!
sidebar.step_1.title: 📋 UMmiselo
sidebar.step_1.description: UMmiselo woKwakha 5(1)(b) ufuna iNkcazo yeMpilo noKhuseleko kuzo zonke iiprojekthi, ngelixa i-7(1)(b) ifuna iFayile ye-H&S.
sidebar.step_1.fun_fact: 🛡️ Inyaniso eMnandi: I-Spec ye-H&S eyomeleleyo inokunciphisa iingozi nge-30%! Ifana nekhaka lokhuseleko leprojekthi yakho.
sidebar.step_2.title: 📋 UMmiselo
sidebar.step_2.description: UMmiselo woKwakha 5: Abathengi kufuneka banike iNkcazo yeMpilo noKhuseleko kwaye baqinisekise ukuthobela kwabakhontrakthi.
sidebar.step_2.fun_fact: 💼 Inyaniso eMnandi: Abathengi abagcina ubhaliso lwe-COIDA bangaphepha izohlwayo ezinkulu—gcina le nombolo ikufuphi!
sidebar.step_3.title: 📜 UMmiselo
sidebar.step_3.description: UMmiselo woKwakha 7(1)(a): Abakhontrakthi kufuneka baphuhlise iSicwangciso seMpilo noKhuseleko esisekelwe kwinkcazo yomthengi.
sidebar.step_3.fun_fact: 🤝 Inyaniso eMnandi: Ukuqesha umkhontrakthi kwangethuba kunokukhawulezisa ukuthobela—intsebenziswano yenza iphupha lokhuseleko lisebenze!
sidebar.step_4.title: 📋 UMmiselo
sidebar.step_4.description: UMmiselo woKwakha 7(1)(b): Abakhontrakthi kufuneka bagcine iFayile yeMpilo noKhuseleko emsebenzini enazo zonke iingxelo ezifunekayo.
sidebar.step_4.fun_fact: 📞 Inyaniso eMnandi: Ukuba neenkcukacha zoqhagamshelwano zomkhontrakthi zilungile kunokusindisa usuku ngexesha likaxakeko—hlala uxhume!
sidebar.step_5.title: 📜 UMmiselo
sidebar.step_5.description: UMmiselo woKwakha 3(1): Imvume iyafuneka kwiiprojekthi ezingaphezulu kwe-R40,000 okanye ezithatha iintsuku ezingaphezulu kwe-180.
sidebar.step_5.fun_fact: 🚧 Inyaniso eMnandi: Iidilesi zesayithi ezicacileyo zinceda abasebenzi bakaxakeko bakufumane ngokukhawuleza—sukuvumela impazamo yokuchwetheza icekeceke uncedo!
sidebar.step_6.title: 📋 UMmiselo
sidebar.step_6.description: UMmiselo woKwakha 9: uVavanyo lwe-Hazard Identification kunye noMngcipheko (HIRAs) ngokukhethekileyo luyafuneka kuzo zonke izinto.
sidebar.step_6.fun_fact: 🔍 Inyaniso eMnandi: Ukubona imisebenzi enobungozi kwangethuba kunokunciphisa imingcipheko nge-25%—ifana nokunika iprojekthi yakho amandla okhuseleko!
sidebar.step_7.title: 📜 UMmiselo
sidebar.step_7.description: Izikhokelo ze-SACPCMP: Ama-CHSO kunye nama-PrCHSA kufuneka agcine ubhaliso kunye neemfuno ze-CPD ukuqinisekisa ukuthobela.
sidebar.step_7.fun_fact: 🧑‍💼 Inyaniso eMnandi: Umntu ovunyiweyo we-SACPCMP unokunciphisa imingcipheko yomthetho—i-MVP yokhuseleko yeprojekthi yakho!
sidebar.step_8.title: 📋 UMmiselo
sidebar.step_8.description: UMmiselo woKwakha 5(1)(l): Abathengi kufuneka bavume iSicwangciso se-H&S somkhontrakthi ngaphambi kokuba umsebenzi uqale.
sidebar.step_8.fun_fact: 📝 Inyaniso eMnandi: Ukuxanduva okucacileyo kumaxwebhu kunokukhulisa ukucaca kweprojekthi—wonke umntu uyayazi indima yakhe!
sidebar.step_9.title: 📜 UMmiselo
sidebar.step_9.description: UMthetho weMpilo noKhuseleko eMsebenzini: Amaxwebhu afanelekileyo aqinisekisa ukuthobela kwaye akhusele bonke abathathi-nxaxheba.
sidebar.step_9.fun_fact: 🛒 Inyaniso eMnandi: Ingobozi yakho sisixhobo sakho sokhuseleko—ixwebhu ngalinye olongeza lenze iprojekthi yakho ikhuseleke ngakumbi!
